entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
